reportPage.title: Report an Issue
reportPage.subtitle: Use your voice or upload photos to report civic issues in your area
reportPage.voiceRecordingHint: Tap the microphone to record your report in {language}
reportPage.transcriptionHint: You can edit the transcription if needed
reportPage.photosSectionHint: Add up to 3 photos to support your report
reportPage.successMessage: We'll notify you of updates via SMS and app notifications.
reportPage.errorNoInput: Please record a voice message or upload photos
reportPage.errorNoLocation: Location is required. Please enable location services.
reportPage.errorSubmit: Failed to submit report. Please try again.

photoVerification.noGPS: Photo does not contain GPS location data
photoVerification.noGPSTip: Enable location services on your camera
photoVerification.tooFar: This photo was taken {distance} km away from the reported location
photoVerification.tooFarHint: Please upload a photo from the actual incident location
photoVerification.tooOld: This photo was taken {hours} hours ago
photoVerification.futureTimestamp: This photo has a future timestamp

voiceRecorder.microphoneError: Microphone access denied. Please enable microphone permissions.

dashboard.noReports: No reports yet. Start by reporting an issue!
